items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects the real values for Chromium (Chrome, Opera, Samsung Internet, WebView Android) for the orientation member of the Screen API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v4.0.0).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/Screen/orientation

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
items.title: Update Chromium versions for api.Screen.orientation
